name: Stage Name Generator
description: Ready to rock the world? Or maybe just a local open mic night? Either way, you need a stage name that screams 'legendary'! Our generator crafts killer stage names using your own name as the secret sauce. Get ready for your close-up!
introduction: Forget boring, forget bland. Your stage name is your identity, your brand, your battle cry!  This ain't no ordinary name generator; we're talking pure, unadulterated coolness.  We'll take your given name and twist, bend, and transform it into something worthy of the spotlight.  So, are you ready to unveil your inner rockstar, comedian, or poet?
howToUse: First things first, spill the beans! Tell us your name (or the name you *wish* was yours – no judgment!).
Hit that 'Generate' button like you're hitting the jackpot.  Seriously, it's that easy.
Behold! A dazzling array of stage names, crafted just for you.  Prepare to be amazed (and maybe a little overwhelmed by all the awesomeness).
Pick your favorite!  Try saying it out loud, imagine it on a marquee, and see if it feels like 'you'.
Go forth and conquer the stage!  (And maybe send us a shout-out when you're famous – we'll take credit for your success, obviously.)

faqs.question: Is this thing actually free?
faqs.answer: Yep! Totally, utterly, completely free. We're here to spread the stage name love without emptying your wallet.

faqs.question: Can I use more than one generated name?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Use 'em all! Mix and match, create a whole alter ego family. The stage is your oyster!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names generated?
faqs.answer: No problem! Just hit that 'Generate' button again. We've got a whole arsenal of names ready to be unleashed.

faqs.question: Will this generator make me famous?
faqs.answer: We can't guarantee fame (although we secretly hope it will!). But we *can* guarantee you'll have a killer stage name that's uniquely yours.

faqs.question: Is my data safe?
faqs.answer: Totally! We don't store your name or any other personal information. We're just here to generate awesome names, not collect your secrets.

faqs.question: Can I trademark a name generated here?
faqs.answer: While we provide cool name suggestions, we can't offer legal advice. You'll need to consult with a trademark attorney to ensure your chosen name is available and protectable.
